products.name: Standard Linear Bearings
products.design: Ball bearing design with interchangeable dimensions, offering standard, adjustable (AJ), open (OP), and long (L) configurations for versatile mounting options.
products.applications: General purpose linear motion, automation machinery
products.features: Standard, Adjustable (AJ), Open (OP), and Long (L) types. Interchangeable dimensions with steel outer cylinder and steel or resin retainer for reliable operation.
products.differentiator: High Precision and Rigidity, Ease of Assembly, Variety of Types (Metric/Inch)

specifications.materials: Steel outer cylinder, Steel or Resin retainer

products.name: Flanged Linear Bearings
products.design: Integrated flange design available in round (F), square (K), and two-side cut (H) configurations with standard, long (L), and middle (M) flange options for direct mounting.
products.applications: Applications requiring secure, direct mounting of the bearing.
products.features: Round (F), Square (K), Two-side cut (H) flanges. Standard, Long (L), and Middle (M) flange types with steel outer cylinder and resin retainer.
products.differentiator: Integrated flange simplifies design and assembly, ensuring perpendicularity.

products.name: Linear Bearing Slide Units
products.design: Pre-assembled aluminum housing block with integrated steel bearing, available in standard (UU), open (UUOP), and long (LUU) versions for turnkey linear motion solutions.
products.applications: Turnkey linear slides, automated gantries, measurement equipment.
products.features: Aluminum housing block for easy mounting. Standard (UU), Open (UUOP), and Long (LUU) versions provide complete slide assembly ready for installation.
products.differentiator: Pre-assembled unit reduces design time and guarantees alignment.

products.name: Linear Guideways
products.design: Precision linear guideway system featuring 45° contact angle ball design for equal load distribution in all directions with self-aligning capability and low noise operation.
products.applications: High-precision machine tools, CNC machines, robotics, semiconductor manufacturing.
products.features: 45° contact angle for equal load in all directions, self-aligning capability, low noise operation, interchangeable carriages and rails for maintenance flexibility.
products.differentiator: High Rigidity, Four-way Equal Load, Interchangeable carriages/rails.
